intro: Bonamia media var. media, commonly known as the common bonamia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of about 30–60 cm. The plant features lance-shaped leaves with a smooth texture and produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, well-drained soil and prefers partial to full sunlight. The species is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a ground cover.
